The claim was published on Facebook on J: 2020, and has been shared more than 150 times.
The claim includes a purported screensho: World Health Organization (WHO), and New England Journal of Medicine (NEJM) admit that wearing a mask can lead to severe health issues.
The NEJM is a peer: reviewed US medical journal, and the purported screenshot includes a web link leading to a video featuring Dr. Kelly Victory, a US-based physician.
The video featuring Dr: Kelly Victory makes claims that were debunked by a US-based fact-check site, and a statement from a WHO spokesperson on July 30 confirms that the claim is untrue. The WHO and CDC both advocate wearing face masks during the COVID-19 pandemic.
